author: cferraio
body:
Hi,

RPD (reaction plane detector, extension of the ZDC) has been implemented. ZDCdet id's, unpacker, topology, and geometry all updated for the change. Note that the "main" zdc (the em and had sections previously in castor) will remain readout through castor until after the pPb run. RPD runs on qie10s, so it is processed identically to HF.

Backport to 80X coming soon.

-Chris
title: RPD implemented in 81X
